content: materials - 10 17 skeins of purl soho s plenty 1 100% extra fine merino wool each skein is 139 yards/ 100g approximately 1 390 2 363 yards required we used heirloom white - us 9 5 5 mm 40- or 47-inch circular needles 2 depending on size you are making - a cable stitch holder 3 gauge 20 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in 8×2 rib 16 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes crib throw finished dimensions 32 inches wide x 43¼ inches long 42 inches wide x 54¼ inches long sample we knit the crib size designed by purl soho designer jake canton 4 click here 5 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/plenty html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 5 http //www jakecanton com/
